object.content:
JUNGLE RUNNING THROUGH THE AMAZON RAINFOREST
- by Sean Barrett - http://bit.ly/12fn1RY

Check out the latest post on MyDogtagAdventures by a crazy Scot who recently finished the Amazon Rainforest Jungle Marathon. Sean did admirably, finishing strong despite seasoned extreme marathon runners pulling out along the way. A great guy customer too - thanks Sean :)

Got something you could feature on our blog? Check www.mydogtagadventures.com to read some of the fantastic stories submitted by you guys. What’s more, all bloggers get a Dogtag discount code off insurance as well as our almighty Dogtag t-shirt known as "the shirt". If you have something in mind send an email to enquiries@dogtag.co.uk. It can be a video, series of images, some text, about any decent adventure you’ve been on. By the way, really excellent contributions also qualify for the Dogtag Ducti wallet.
